title: My Pixel 4a is a day old and it is heating up to 43 degrees upon literally 5 mins of usage
content: I have just set up the phone and used for a day and it is hot all the time, camera does not work saying phone is too warm, I checked the temperature, it goes up to 44-45 within 15 mins of using the phone. Basic whatsapp it is unable to handle. Should I apply to a replacement? attaching a screenshot with legit 5 mins of charging.
